channel.title: ZEC on Quiet time notes
channel.description: Recent content in ZEC on Quiet time notes

item.title: ZEC 4
item.description: ZEC 4:6 The Holy Spirit symbolises oil and the Lord Jesus said we are the light of the world. For us to continue to shine as light, we need an infinite supply of oil (constant Communion with the Holy Spirit). Related verses: ZECHARIAH 4:6. See notes

item.title: ZEC 3
item.description: ZEC 3:6 Conditioned upon obedience. Faithfulness + service to God = control over the things of God + free access to God?s presence Related verses: ZECHARIAH 3:6-7. See notes

item.title: ZEC 2
item.description: ZEC 2:9 Signs of the trinity. Although the Holy Spirit is not mentioned here but we see the Lord of Host sending the LORD to dwell among his people. Related verses: ZECHARIAH 2:9-11. See notes
